item.description: Ukrainian military had 48 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region and Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Chasiv Yar, Novyy, Klischiyivka, Andriyivka of Donetsk region, Semenivka of Donetsk region, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka, Robotyne, north-west Verbove and north Pryutne of Zaporizhzhia region, at the east bank of Dnipro river, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
